question: A friend has agreed to look after your house and pet while you are on holiday. Write a letter to your friend.In your letter:give contact details for when you are awaygive instructions on how to care for your petdescribe other household duties
text: Thank you very much for agreeing with me to stay at my place while I am visiting my sister in California.

I have a flight at 11 PM but I will be leaving the house in the afternoon around 3 PM. I will leave the key for the main entrance in the garden shed. You can get into the house using that key and in the drawing-room inside the yellow flower pot, there are keys for the rest of the rooms.

By the way, Can I ask you for help? Please water the plan twice a week as it’s really important that the soil has moisture. Besides, I am expecting an important letter from the health care department. I’d really appreciate it if you can send a picture of a letter once you receive any from the relevant department.q

I will be back in London on 22nd March. My flight will land at 1 AM, I will then take a cab so I will be home by around 3 AM. I don’t want you to be up so late as I have keys I will manage to enter the house.
Make yourself comfortable and feel at home. Thank you once again!
